content: Submit your form to the public gallery to let others use it in their work. Once the form passes moderation, you will be notified and rewarded for your contribution.

comment.text: "This translation key is used to display instructions and guidelines on how to submit a form to the public gallery for use by others. It appears in a modal dialog when the user submits their form and is designed to inform them about the moderation process and potential rewards."

usage.context:
return ( {t("Common:SubmitToFormGallery")}
{t("FormGallery:SubmitToGalleryDialogMainInfo")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "السماح للمستخدمين استخدامه" (allowing users to use it) is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "ليتمكن الآخرون من استخدامه" (so others can use it).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتسليم النموذج الخاص بك إلى المعرض العام لكي يتمكن الآخرون من استخدامه في أعمالهم.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "بمجرد أن يتم قبول النموذج" (once the form is accepted) can be improved. A more natural and concise phrasing would be "عندما يتم اعتماد النموذج" (when the form is approved/validated).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتسليم النموذج الخاص بك إلى المعرض العام لكي يتمكن الآخرون من استخدامه في أعمالهم. عندما يتم اعتماد النموذج سيتم إعلامك وسيتم مكافئتك على مساهمتك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation 'Bu otağın sahibi sizsiniz. Otağı tərk etməzdən əvvəl sahib rolunu başqa istifadəçiyə ötürməlisiniz.' translates to 'You are the owner of this room. Before leaving the room, you must transfer the owner role to another user.' This does not accurately convey the original English meaning, which describes submitting a form to a public gallery.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like: 'Formunuzu ictimai qalereyaya göndərin ki başqaları işlərində istifadə eləsinlər. Formunuz moderasiyadan keçdikdən sonra bildiriləcəksiniz və töhfənizə görə mükafatlandırılacaqsınız.' (Submit your form to the public gallery so that others can use it in their work. You will be notified when your form passes moderation and rewarded for your contribution.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation completely misses the meaning of the English content. It states 'You are the owner of this room. Before leaving the room, you must transfer the owner role to another user.' which is unrelated to submitting a form to a public gallery.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The translation needs to accurately convey the meaning of submitting a form to a public gallery and receiving a reward after moderation. A possible suggestion: 'Изпратете своя формуляр в публична галерия, за да могат други да го използват в работата си. След като формулярът премине модерация, ще бъдете уведомени и възнаградени за приноса си.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation does not accurately reflect the English content. It discusses transferring ownership of a room, whereas the English text is about submitting a form to a public gallery.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The translation needs to be completely rewritten to reflect the original meaning of submitting a form to a public gallery, including notification and rewards for contribution.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation is completely unrelated to the English content. It translates to "You are the owner of this room. Before leaving the room, you must transfer the owner role to another user." This does not convey the meaning of submitting a form to a public gallery.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The translation needs to be rewritten to accurately reflect the English content. A possible suggestion would be: "Υποβάλετε τη φόρμα σας στη δημόσια γκαλερί για να μπορούν άλλοι να τη χρησιμοποιήσουν στην εργασία τους. Αφού η φόρμα εγκριθεί από τους επιθεωρητές, θα ειδοποιηθείτε και θα λάβετε ανταμοιβή για τη συνεισφορά σας."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation completely fails to convey the meaning of the English content. It states 'You are the owner of this room. You must transfer the owner role to another user before leaving the room.' which is unrelated to submitting a form to a public gallery.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A correct translation would convey the meaning of submitting a form to a public gallery, receiving moderation approval, and potential rewards. For example: 'Lähetä lomake julkiseen galleriaan, jotta muut voivat käyttää sitä työssään. Kun lomake on läpäissyt tarkastuksen, saat ilmoituksen ja palkinnon panoksestasi.' (Submit your form to the public gallery so that others can use it in their work. When the form passes moderation, you will receive a notification and a reward for your contribution.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ուրիշներն' (urishnern) should be 'ուրիշները' (urishnere).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ուրիշները

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "他の人に使ってもらいましょう" (o-ta ni tsukatte moraishō) implies a request or expectation that others *will* use the form, rather than an invitation. A more appropriate phrasing would convey a suggestion or possibility.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 他の人があなたのフォームを利用できるようにしましょう (Hoka no hito ga anata no fōmu o riyō dekiru yō ni shimashō)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "rewarded for your contribution" could be more precise. "報酬が与えられます" (hōshū ga ataeraremasu) is grammatically correct but can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: あなたの貢献に報いる報酬が与えられます (Anata no kōken ni hōn'i suru hōshū ga ataeraremasu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Submit your form" is overly literal and can be improved for natural flow in Korean. While technically correct, it doesn't sound idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 양식을 갤러리에 등록하세요 (Yangsig eul gaelleo-e deungmok haseyo)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'let others use it in their work' is a bit clunky. A more natural translation might be '활용할 수 있도록 (hwalyonghal su itdorok).'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 활용할 수 있도록 (hwalyonghal su itdorok)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "알림이 전송되며 기여에 대해 보상을 받게 됩니다" is slightly awkward. A more concise and natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 검토를 통과하면 알림을 받으시고 기여에 대한 보상을 받으실 수 있습니다 (Geomtok eul tonggwa hamyeon alrim eun badeusigiyo giyeo-e daehan bosang eun badeusil su isseumnida).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ປານກາງ" (pan-gang) in the Lao translation doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "moderation" in this context. It literally translates to 'middle' or 'center'. A more appropriate translation would be something like "ການກວດກາ" (kan-guat-gaa) or "ການຕີລາຄາ" (kan-tee-la-kha).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "ປານກາງ" with "ການກວດກາ" or "ການຕີລາຄາ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "lai ļautu citiem" (to allow others) is slightly awkward and not the most natural way to express the intent. It implies giving permission rather than making available.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iesniedziet savu veidlapu publiskajā galerijā, lai citi varētu to izmantot savā darbā.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "par jūsu ieguldījumu" (for your contribution) is a bit formal and doesn't quite capture the rewarding aspect as well as a more direct translation would.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: par jūsu ieguldījumu un saņemsiet balvu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "în lucrul" is not grammatically correct. It should be "în munca lor" or "în proiectele lor" to accurately convey 'in their work'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Depuneți formularul dvs la galeria publică pentru a permite altora să-l folosească în munca lor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'lucrul' (the work) is too vague. It doesn't specify the context in which the form would be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Depuneți formularul dvs la galeria publică pentru a permite altora să-l folosească în proiectele lor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Submit your form" is not accurately reflected. 'යොමු කරන්න' (yomu korenna) is more like 'refer' or 'direct' rather than 'submit'. A better translation for 'Submit' would convey the action of sending something for approval or publication.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ ආකෘතිය ඉදිරිපත් කරන්න (Obae aakruthy idiripath karanne)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "moderation" is translated as "මැදිහත්කරණයෙන් සමත් වූ පසු" (madihathkarayanen samath vu pasu), which is not a direct or clear translation. It suggests 'having become capable through moderation,' which is confusing. A simpler translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සමාධීකරණයෙන් පසුව (samaadhikaraneyen pasu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'reward' is not accurately translated. 'ත්‍යාගයක් පිරිනමනු ලැබේ' (thiyagayak pirinamunu geleb) translates to 'a gift will be given'. While related, 'reward' implies a more direct compensation for contribution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට ප්‍රතිපාදන ලැබේ (Obata pathipathana gele)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "používať ho" is a bit awkward and could be improved. A more natural Slovak translation for 'use it' would be 'využívať ho'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odošlite svoj formulár do verejnej galérie a umožnite ostatným, využívať ho v ich práci.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Skalený moderátormi” is not a standard term. It sounds like it’s trying to mean 'moderated'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odošlite svoj formulár do verejnej galérie a umožnite ostatným, využívať ho v ich práci. Po tom, ako formulár bude skontrolovaný moderátormi, budete informovaní a odmenení za svoj vklad.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Поднесите" (Podnesite) implies submitting a formal document or application. "Submit" in this context means to offer or present. A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "Објавите свој образац" (Objavite svoj obrazac) or "Пошаљите свој образац" (Posaljite svoj obrazac).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Пошаљите свој образац у Јавну галерију да би други могли да га користе за свој посао.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'за свој посао' (za svoj posao) is quite literal and could be improved.  It doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'in their work' - it implies that the form is being used for some sort of specific work/job and not in a broader sense.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: у њиховом раду

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Submit your form' is better translated as 'Predajte svoj obrazac' rather than 'Podnesite svoj obrazac'. While 'podnesete' isn't incorrect, 'predajte' is more commonly used and conveys the meaning of submitting something for approval.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Predajte svoj obrazac u Javnu galeriju da bi drugi mogli da ga koriste za svoj posao.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'moderaciju' is technically correct, but 'prođe kroz moderaciju' or simply 'prođe proveru' flows more naturally in Serbian. 'Moderaciju' sounds overly literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kada obrazac prođe proveru...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "başkasının çalışmalarında kullanmasına izin vermek" (to allow others to use in their work) is a bit verbose and doesn't flow as naturally as a more concise phrasing. It's a literal translation of 'to let others use it in their work'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formunuzu başkalarının çalışmalarında kullanabilmesi için genel galeriye gönderin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English uses 'rewarded for your contribution'.  'Ödüllendirileceksiniz' is a direct translation, but in Turkish, a slightly more active phrasing might be preferable to emphasize the benefit to the contributor.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Katkınızdan dolayı ödüllendirileceksiniz veya bir ödül alacaksınız.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a little clunky. While grammatically correct, it could be made more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formunuzu genel galeriye göndererek başkalarının çalışmalarında kullanmasını sağlayın. Form denetimden geçtikten sonra katkınız için bilgilendirilecek ve ödüllendirileceksiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to let others use it in their work" is a bit awkward in Vietnamese. It doesn't quite capture the nuance of letting others leverage the form for their projects or applications. A more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gửi biểu mẫu của bạn đến bộ sưu tập công cộng để người khác có thể sử dụng biểu mẫu đó cho các dự án hoặc ứng dụng của họ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "thưởng cho khoản đóng góp của mình" sounds formal and stiff. A more approachable and common expression for "rewarded for your contribution" would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gửi biểu mẫu của bạn đến bộ sưu tập công cộng để người khác có thể sử dụng biểu mẫu đó cho các dự án hoặc ứng dụng của họ. Sau khi biểu mẫu được kiểm duyệt, bạn sẽ được thông báo và được đền bù cho sự đóng góp của mình.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "让他人在工作中使用" is a bit awkward. It literally translates to 'let others use it in their work,' but in a more natural Chinese flow, it could be rephrased to emphasize usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 将您的表单提交至公共表单库，方便他人将其应用于工作。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English 'rewarded for your contribution' is simplified in the Chinese translation.  It doesn't convey the nuance of the reward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 表单通过审核，您将收到通知并获得相应的奖励。
